SAMRAI::algs::OuteredgeSumTransactionFactory Class Reference

Concrete subclass of the xfer::RefineTransactionFactory base class that allocates outeredge sum transaction objects for a xfer::RefineSchedule object. More...

Detailed Description

Concrete subclass of the xfer::RefineTransactionFactory base class that allocates outeredge sum transaction objects for a xfer::RefineSchedule object.

See also:
xfer::RefineTransactionFactory
xfer::OuteredgeSumTransaction

const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchLevel > &  src_level,

int  item_id,
const hier::Box &  box,

Allocate an OuteredgeSumTransaction object.

Parameters:
dst_level boost::shared_ptr to destination patch level.
src_level boost::shared_ptr to source patch level.
overlap boost::shared_ptr to overlap region between patches.
dst_node Destination Box in destination patch level.
src_node Source Box in source patch level.
refine_data Pointer to array of refine data items
item_id Integer index of xfer::RefineClasses::Data item associated with transaction.
box Optional const reference to box defining region of refine transaction. Use next method if not required.
use_time_interpolation Optional boolean flag indicating whether the refine transaction involves time interpolation. Default is false.
Precondition:
dst_level
src_level
overlap
dst_node.getLocalId() >= 0
src_node.getLocalId() >= 0
item_id >= 0
(dst_level->getDim() == src_level->getDim()) && (dst_level->getDim() == dst_node.getDim()) && (dst_level->getDim() == src_node.getDim())

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::RefineTransactionFactory.

References SAMRAI::hier::Box::getLocalId(), NULL_USE, TBOX_ASSERT, and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY4.

Referenced by allocate().

Allocate an OuteredgeSumTransaction object.

Same as previous allocate routine but with default empty box and no timer interpolation.

void SAMRAI::algs::OuteredgeSumTransactionFactory::preprocessScratchSpace ( const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchLevel > &  level,
double  fill_time,
const hier::ComponentSelector &  preprocess_vector 
) const [virtual]

Function to initialize scratch space data for the sum transactions (patch data components indicated by the component selector) to zero.

Parameters:
level boost::shared_ptr to patch level holding scratch data.
fill_time Double value of simulation time at which preprocess operation is called.
preprocess_vector Const reference to hier::ComponentSelector indicating patch data array indices of scratch patch data objects to preprocess.
Precondition:
level

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::RefineTransactionFactory.

References BOOST_CAST, SAMRAI::hier::ComponentSelector::getSize(), SAMRAI::hier::ComponentSelector::isSet(), NULL_USE, and TBOX_ASSERT.
